Reviews.Title: “Best hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: VeryHappyTraveler
Reviews.Content: Went to this hotel for 2 days on our way to Disney. It was fantastic. All new rooms and clean very very clean. The staff was awesome and helpful and very nice. The pool was sparkling clean. Would not stay any where else in Daytona Beach but this fine place!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and staff was great”
Reviews.Author: frank m
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night with my son for a baseball tournament. Found the room very clean and the staff very nice. My son summed it up perfectly when he said "It's not so fancy, but it's really clean" The location was perfect, beach was great, pool was nice. The breakfast not so good, we ate the hotel next door.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: Rick G
Reviews.Content: Our stay was very enjoyable. Jacquelyn greeted us at the front desk, and was very helpful. Yes parking was a little cramped at times, BUT, all of the ocean front hotels have small parking lots. And, this hotel offered additional parking across the street. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable. The pool was a bit small, but the pool area was great. And, the hot tub was nice and hot! In addition, we were allowed to go next door to an extremely large pool and hot tub, and it included a bar and bon fires. It seems this hotel has thought of everything to make your stay great! We will be back next year. What a great discovery!

Reviews.Title: “Oceanfront & Very Clean! Pleasantly Surprised!”
Reviews.Author: LadyJayneG
Reviews.Content: Although I only stayed here for one night, I wish it had been longer. Having had a bad experience at a similarly priced budget chain in Florida on this trip, I was slightly apprehensive on the drive over. I needn't have worried. Yes, this hotel is at the lower end of the market but has bought into the belief that this doesn't mean it has to be dark, dingy and dirty. It was absolutely immaculate. The lady on reception who checked us in could not have been more friendly. She went out of the way to make us feel comfortable, offered suggestions on places to eat and even gave us a call about 20 minutes after we checked in to make sure that everything was ok. GREAT customer service! The rooms are a decent size (but there were only 2 of us - it might be a bit of a squeeze with any more that that). The beds were comfortable - the only issue was the mattress protector. As other reviewers have mentioned, these appear to be plastic and when you move they make a noise. The hotel is right on the oceanfront, the pool being between the building and the beach so you have the best of both worlds. Free continental breakfast is a nice touch as is the free wifi in all rooms - something that you wouldn't necessarily expect at a chain like this. All in all, this is a great hotel from which to base yourself in Daytona. I look forward to returning the next time I make the trip over - hopefully the mattress issue will be resolved by then.

Reviews.Title: “Ocean Front and Clean”
Reviews.Author: MiaInMiami
Reviews.Content: I was very happy because the room was CLEAN hard to find for a budget hotel. Rooms are small and mattress cover was made out of plastic and it was very loud and uncomfortable. Hotel is beach front and has a pool.Free continental breakfast ( bagels, coffee, juice and muffins) and wifi in all the rooms. For the price I thought it was great, I would stay here again as long as the price is right.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Valerie S
Reviews.Content: Great Value for what you pay! $60/night w/ wifi & continental breakfast included. Nice, clean rooms & wonderful staff. Price is supposed to go up on the weekends but he extended us the same rate since we booked early. GREAT front desk guy, Steve. Super nice, genuinely friendly & helpful. We basically had the beach area in front of hotel to ourselves, which we LOVED! Dont know if it was just the off season, but we really enjoyed not being crowded. Cant say enough about the value of this hotel for the price!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, nice price.”
Reviews.Author: 89Achelle
Reviews.Content: I took a girls trip to Daytona Beach, FL. I was skeptical about staying in an Econo Lodge, because the ones where I live look pretty bad. The price was good, and according to the reviews it had been recently renovated so we gave it a shot, I was pleasantly surprised to find that the rooms were nice and clean! Nothing, fancy was wasted, but it was still nice and complete with a small kitchenette area. We were also right on the beach! it was so convenient to just walk out the back of the hotel and be right on the beach. The bagels set out in the morning can hardly be called a breakfast, and the parking lot is a little strange, but these are hardly negatives for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kennith H
Reviews.Content: I spent a night here 2 weeks ago reserving 2 ocen view rooms after consulting tripadvisor. What a little gem of a hotel. The ocean view was spectacular and the employess were both friendly and helpful. The rooms were a little small but who goes to Daytona Beach to spend the day in a room? It had a fridge,microwave and even a sink and plates. The employees were very helpful in assisting me in finding a restaurant we read on this site Crabby Joe's. They drew out a map and gave verbal instructions. Parking is a little tight but across the street is a large parking lot. For the price it is an incredible steal when you look at the view and ocean access beung so easy. My daughter wants to stay there for several days next year which I am now planning

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: beachlover32054
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed the weekend here. It was very pleasant for the price. As most reviews state, the parking is bad, but the lot accross the street is avaiable for overflow. The rooms were clean and we enjoyed our time

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprised”
Reviews.Author: Sofia850
Reviews.Content: I went to Daytona for an inexpensive vacation, and I was pleasant surprised with this small hotel in front of the beach. The room was very clean and it was beautiful. I think the hotel was renovated recently. We were allowed to use the pool at the Holiday Inn next door, but we did not need it. The pool was small, but my kids love it. I spent a lot of time at the pool overlooking the ocean. The hot tub was too hot for my taste; I didn’t allow my kids to go on it. The breakfast room smells very bad, and breakfast? There is no breakfast, just bagels, coffee and orange juice. But I do not complaint for the price. I read the reviews before, and I was prepared to have breakfast outside of the hotel. The staff was very friendly, and they answered all my questions in a polite manner. Overall, I spent a wonderful week at this hotel, and my kids had a lot of fun. I will definitely will be back at this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: cm34473
Reviews.Content: Parking lot was very small,hard to get out of. The beds have these noisy plastic on them ,I felt like I wad sleeping on a noisy plastic bag of potatoes. My back was killing me. I would rather spend a little more on a hotel next time.

Reviews.Title: “nice job”
Reviews.Author: willie j
Reviews.Content: Having been at many different places in Daytona over the last 25 years it was nice to see the ownership group take one of the origional small motels and complete some very nice renovations. Good Job!

Reviews.Title: “Better than we expected”
Reviews.Author: caseyANDben
Reviews.Content: We were looking to extend our vacation by traveling from Port Richey to Daytona Beach for a few days. After reading reviews and specifically seeing the price and recently renovated status, we decided to give the Econo Lodge a shot. We use hotel rooms in Daytona primarily for sleeping so frills were not expected. Jacqui (front desk) was very pleasant and helpful. She gave us some information about a nearby restaurant and offered up the "scenery" from the Holiday Inn next door. We didn't need it... We were in room 110, a bottom corner oceanfront room overlooking the pool with a direct view of the beach. The bedding was nice and upon inspection of the bed, things looked very well taken care of and clean. The bathroom was sparkling white! I was not impressed with the lack of counter space in the bathroom but was very pleased overall with the space. There was a kitchenette with a small sink and half-size stove, a brand new and very clean microwave and clean fridge. The AC worked very well. My daughter (2 years old) loved the pool, but like other reviews the spa pool is a bit too hot for adults and I certainly didn't let the little one in it. The hotel was quire surprising and much better than expected!

Reviews.Title: “Love this hidden gem of a hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Sandyfeet1212
Reviews.Content: Brought the family down for an inexpensive vacation, but was pleasantly surprised by what I found at the hotel! The room we stayed in was decorated beautifully and very clean. The staff were great and very friendly. The manager was eager to help and provided helpful information! The pool was very clean, especially for being beach front. Overall, I was very surprised with the service and quality of this hotel! I definitely got more than my money's worth. I will be staying here anytime I'm in the area and will be sure to tell all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Save your $ and pass this motel by...”
Reviews.Author: familytravels2013
Reviews.Content: I could ramble on and on about all of my unhappiness with this place so I'll spare you all the reading and just do bullet points. 1.) continental breakfast should be renamed 'stale pastries & empty coffee canisters' , and this was at 7:35 am! And to boot the lazy worker was on her cell and clipping coupons in lue of actually working. 2.) parking is beyond ridiculous , sure they have parking across the street but when that's full guest are forced to park clear up to the doors literally on the side walks. 3.) my room was filthy when we checked in... Huge fail. And by filthy I mean sand on the ground and in the tub and all over th bathroom floor. 4.)after complaining to the front desk the woman basically told us to 'deal' with it.... Gee I'm so happy to know my hard earned money went to supporting this lazy workers. And I've been to plenty of hotels/motels/resorts in my life time and expecting a CLEAN room isn't asking alot. And as for that pathetic continental breakfast they should just serve coffee and not confuse themselves with other difficulties little FOOD.

Reviews.Title: “great stay for the price.”
Reviews.Author: Marvin N
Reviews.Content: i booked this stay for the proximal location to the beach and the waterpark. the stay was great I had one problem the refrigerator in the room stopped working. I called the front desk and it was immediately switched out with one that worked. I wwould stay there gain for the price but the breakfast definately needs to be updated.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you Arden and Staff”
Reviews.Author: beverly w
Reviews.Content: I really do not have the words for the weekend me and my husband had at the Econo Lodge,, A day that I will never forget these people went all out to make sure our stay was just what we wanted and guess what they passed,, May 19,2012 we celerbrated our 28th Anniversary at the Econo Lodge,, Arden is one of the nices people that you will ever meet, When we got to our room there was a note on our bed that read happy Anniversary!!!! and it made me feel like i was on the cruise ship the towel decorated like a animal. the bathroom was beautiful plus my kitchen. We will be coming back if you ever need a nice clean quite place to stay and meet a awesome staff go the Econo Lodge next to the Holiday Inn>>>> Love Arden you are the best

Reviews.Title: “Quick weekend”
Reviews.Author: Michaellee1977
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a great weekend. Rooms are freshly renovated, and we had a great ocean view. All the staff were very friendly, thank you Arden for early check in and late check out. This motel is small but has a great pool area with access to the beach. We will most definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Night away with my new Husband”
Reviews.Author: heidi s
Reviews.Content: When we arrived, Ardie the front deck guy was great! Told us all about things going on around town. Very friendly and helpful. The girl in charge of the maids was nice to, she Seemed to really check to make sure the rooms looked perfect. We got to our room and it was beautiful clean, smelled great. They called soon after to make sure everything was ok.The pool area was very nice to. I think there connected to the Holiday Inn next door, the food and entertainment was great they had fire pits and music. It was wonderful! I usually complain about everything, but I could not find one thing. My husband and I will be returning very soon.

Reviews.Title: “New ownership has improved things - needs a little more”
Reviews.Author: Stanicus
Reviews.Content: I am told that the company owns the the Holiday Inn next door and the Condo building on the other side of the hotel. They appear to have done a great deal of renovating in an attempt to improve things. Checking was quick, but I had reserved my room online with a kitchen, but received a regular room. I went back downstairs and they promptly fixed it. So, I would advise you call the hotel to confirm your room once you've reserved it. The room had been remodeled with new bedding and mostly new appliances. All the needed things are supplied. The mattresses are of the firm variety, so make sure you can sleep on a firm mattress. The pool and hot tub area have been completely remodeled and are very nice. They were kept clean on a daily basis. There were always plenty of chars and there are a couple of showers to clean off. They are saltwater treated, so you don't have the constant chlorine chemicals to deal with. They are limited on parking and the lot was almost always full. I never had to invent a parking spot, but saw a couple people who did. Although, I think there were people who had multiple vehicles per room. The pastry breakfast never really had much more than toast and ran out quickly if it did. This could use some serious improvement. Overall, I would go back because it had exactly what I needed. A safe environment, oceanfront, clean and inexpensive. if you are picky, you wont like this place. But if you are laid back and relaxed, you'll do just fine for the price you pay.

Reviews.Title: “Spring break”
Reviews.Author: J T
Reviews.Content: Well, this hotel has a great front desk person! ARDEN was so kind to us. Breakfast was a little snackish, but that was ok with us. Hot tub was HOTTTT! I guess if that is the only complaint must be a great place to stay at! Newly remodled, CLEAN, on the beach...can I say anymore! We parked across the street because hotel lot was full, but never a problem it was well lit. Double bed room was a little small, but who cares all we did was sleep in there! One of our mattress had a plastic cover over it, kinda weird but cleaner I guess. Didn't bothter us too much while sleeping. All the staff was great. But, again Arden went above and beyond for us! Thanks...

Reviews.Title: “Definitely will be back”
Reviews.Author: Travelinggrandma001
Reviews.Content: We were told the motel had only been open a few weeks. Within 30 minutes of arrival, we receive a call from the front desk asking if everything was ok and if we needed anything - I was very impressed! Everything was nice and clean, the beds very comfortable and our room was very spacious. We stayed in a room with a mini-kitchen on the ocean front - it had a small frig., microwave, sink and cabinets with a few dishes. We were on the second floor and had a beach front view that overlooked the pool with a full view of the beach. The pool was heated, they have a hot tub and they had plenty of lounge chairs and tables for guests. There is access to the beach from the pool area with a fresh water rinse off area coming back to wash off the sand. They provide towels for pool and beach use. Breakfast is very simple: toast, danish, coffee and juice and is in a breezeway room that leads out to the pool. The staff was very friendly and made us feel welcome - we will definitely be back

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for a Bike Week”
Reviews.Author: Sprt
Reviews.Content: Not far from the Main Street, poor breakfast, clean rooms, beach front, very close to 7/11. Enough for a Bike Week stay, but beware of small parking space. Despite hassle of a first day of Daytona Bike Week, check-in was fast and problem-free. Overall, would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Beach Front.”
Reviews.Author: Steve S
Reviews.Content: Great. Close to the action on A1A. Room clean. Breakfast consisted of white bread and cheap pastries.

Reviews.Title: “the service made my stay so much more enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: erham
Reviews.Content: an excellent stay for the weekend. the service is amazing, everyone is kind. the food is spectacular, and anything I need is only a question away. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “What a gem!”
Reviews.Author: Mfoxjackson
Reviews.Content: I was really surprised at what a great place this is. Econo Lodge made me think 'budget' and while the price was certainly was economic, the amenities didn't let on it was, the rooms are really beautiful and new. The staff terrific and of course the location was A+++ We find ourselves in the Daytona area periodically and wil certainly be back!

HotelInfo.Name: Econo Lodge
HotelInfo.Address: 1601 S. Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
